Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: I'm hoping that since Java 9 now supports ALPN, we can leverage Java's built in TLS stack for gRPC.

Action.author: sanchezl
Action.body: We might have to wait until gRPC 2.0 is available in order to overcome a gRPC 1.x packaging issue (split packages) that conflicts with the new Java module system.

Action.author: alacambra
Action.body: Would not be better to upgrade directly to Java10?

Action.author: alacambra
Action.body: which java version is gonna be supported on Fabric 1.3?
